product_name: Aquaglide Impulse Stand Up Paddleboard - 11' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Optimized for all-around use on flatwater and surf, the Aquaglide Impulse 11 ft. Stand Up Paddleboard combines a wide, stable outline and durability that's on par with high-end SUPs. 230 lb. weight capacity is suited to larger riders, and 32 in. width offers stability that novices will find helpful during their first outings. Fiberglass composite over a foam core offers high stiffness and side-to-side response. 5mm wood stringers enhance performance. Full-length deck pad offers comfortable traction. EVA tail, rail and nose guards enhance durability. Single fin promotes tracking. Heavy-duty molded handle helps transport of the 51-lb. Aquaglide Impulse 11 ft. Stand Up Paddleboard. Closeout.
short_description: Optimized for all-around use on flatwater and surf, the Aquaglide Impulse 11 ft. Stand Up Paddleboard combines a wide, stable outline and durability that's on par with high-end SUPs.
